sentences.sContent: No new young cretin has been found during or since the initiation of the Emergency Response Plan in 2007.
sentences.sContent_eng: No new young cretin has been found during or since the initiation of the Emergency Response Plan in 2007.
sentences.sCn: 自从2007年紧急反应计划实施以来，还没有发现新的年轻白痴病患者。

trans.tranOther: an offensive word for someone who is extremely stupid
